name: Grabbing some Goblins
description:
hey, have you ever wanted to be a goblin god?

Do you want to grab goblins

fight off the being from the void?

 if so! i have a game for you!!!

the goal is to survive for 400 days with the help with your goblin worshipers

all controls are done with a three button mouse!

Press the middle mouse button to read the controls and tips!

 

All goblin names are randomly generated with the help of my twitch chat!

This is my submission for the 3rd Vaultacular Game Jam.
